22#include <string.h>
23
24extern char *strsave(const char *);
25
26extern const char *current_filename;
27extern int current_lineno;
28
29void change_filename(const char *f)
30{
31 if (current_filename != 0 && strcmp(current_filename, f) == 0)
32 return;
33 current_filename = strsave(f);
34}
35
36void change_lineno(int ln)
37{
38 current_lineno = ln;
39}
40
